snippet: Mr. Beilman’s recital at the Rose Studio paid tribute to Fritz Kreisler, the composer and violinist, with some of his lesser-known work.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by violinist Benjamin Beilman at Lincoln Center's Rose Studio.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Beilman’s recital at the Rose Studio paid tribute to Fritz Kreisler, the composer and violinist, with some of his lesser-known work.

headline.main: Review: Benjamin Beilman Goes Beyond His Violin Bonbons
headline.print_headline: Going Beyond Those Viennese Violin Bonbons
